name: Moss Saddlebag | 24oz Waxed Cotton | Charcoal
description: Handcrafted in New York City from rugged waxed cotton, natural grain leather and nickel plated hardware. Holds a jacket, lunch, flat kit and more. Hangs securely under the saddle or handlebars. Weatherproof 24 oz. heavy duty waxed cotton provides old fashioned resistance against rain and harsh weather without compromising durability. Lash closure fastens larger garments to the outside of the bag. Applications: Saddlebag; Handlebar Bag Connections: Saddle Loops, Springs or Handlebars Measurements: 10" x 5" x 5" Capacity: 4 Liters Color: Charcoal Free Shipping

name: Moss Saddlebag | 18oz Cotton Duck | British Tan
description: Handcrafted in New York City from rugged cotton duck, natural grain leather and nickel plated hardware. Holds a jacket, lunch, flat kit and more. Hangs securely under the saddle or handlebars. Breathable 18 oz. cotton duck canvas is tough as nails, but still provides aeration to dry damp garments as you ride; water treated to withstand a light shower.
